name: Traffic Puzzle
description:
Traffic Puzzle is a brand new match 3 puzzle game! Help two awesome cops restore order in the city! Lucre, the villain, made quite a mess on the streets, and it’s down to you to fix it! Start unblocking cars now!


Traffic Puzzle features:
• fresh matching gameplay combined with block puzzle and jewel blast features
• relaxing game levels that will constantly surprise you
• cute graphics
• multiple power-ups to help you clear the city streets
• get special rewards and boosters when you level up
Play for free with friends, compare your progress and experience this amazing adventure together!
Playing Traffic Puzzle find cars of the same color and blast 3 in a row to:
• clear the way for ambulances so they reach patients on time
• help parents pick up their children from nursery schools on time
• remove wrecks covering the streets of beautiful and relaxing districts
• keep the trains on schedule, as they are transporting kids to school trips
• and last, but not least, play the role of celebrity bodyguards and help helicopters land safely in places crowded with fans!
Special powers like Clown, Police Car or Joker will help you along as you play! But remember… this is a relaxing jewel blast game! You can always match 3 cars in a row to solve a puzzle!

Traffic Puzzle is a relaxing game with matching, completely free to play. However, you may have to pay for some features.
